name: Moalad.GitHub.io
body:
### 2014

1.  Chang Hwi Lee, Geun-Myeong Kim, Young Jun Oh, and K. J. Chang, **"Suppression of boron segregation by interface Ge atoms at SiGe/SiO2 interface"**, [Curr. Appl. Phys. 14, 1557.][1]

2.  In-Ho Lee, Jooyoung Lee, Young Jun Oh, Sunghyun Kim, and K. J. Chang, **"Computational search for direct band gap silicon crystals"**, [Phys. Rev. B 90, 115209.][2]

3.  Sunghyun Kim, Ji-Sang Park, and K. J. Chang **"Finite-size supercell correction scheme for charged defects in one-dimensional systems"**, [Phys. Rev. B 90, 085435.][3]

### 2013

1.  Young Jun Oh, Alex Taekyung Lee, Hyeon-Kyun Noh and K. J. Chang, **"Hybrid functional versus quasiparticle calculations for the Schottky barrier and effective work function at TiN/HfO2 interface"**, [Phys. Rev. B 87, 075325.][4]

2.  will be uploaded

3.  will be uploaded

4.  will be uploaded
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
